title: Rental Dashboard using Flask
features: Built a Flask web dashboard that aggregates rental listings, provides interactive map views, and delivers real‑time analytics to property managers.
Created a modular database architecture (db, geo, locations) that normalizes data, optimizes query performance, and supports scalable ingestion of large property datasets.
Implemented automated email reporting (mail_trial) that compiles key metrics and notifies stakeholders, cutting manual reporting time by 70 %.
